title: Resolution
body: So I had played league the day before (29th) and it ran fine but today (the 30th) its running very poorly, around 6-10 frames when i can usually get around 30-110 (matters on the circumstances). I think my resolution might have changed from 1280 to 1366 or something of that sort, so i hopped in a practice game and tried to change my resolution and the only option is the 1300 one with an asterisk next to it, so I tried changing the resolution in game.cfg but whenever I go into game the file resets to 1300 or whatever even if i save it, what else can i do because the game is completely unplayable. (The client runs fine still)

replies.body:
You might run into problems if you are exceeding 1920x1080.  A config reset should set your resolution back to default:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Update your drivers too via our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide in case scaling options aren't showing up as well.  I hope that helps!
All my settings have reset but I still cant change my resolution from 1366x768 to 1280x720, it still only has one option, im pretty sure thats the problem...

Aw damn, sorry to hear that didn't work. No worries, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can assist you directly.

Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to collect some logs, and attach it to your ticket so we can get more context.  We'll see you in your ticket!
Can you check my ticket now that i submitted it?
I can confirm if it's been received, but won't be able to bump or expedite the ticket.  Let me know the number and I'll take a look!
Received!  Your ticket was escalated to our tech team and a specialist will be with you asap!
